column1: What is a Maestro Hyperscale Orchestrator (MHO)?
column2: An MHO is a scalable Network Security System that connects multiple Check Point Security Appliances into a unified system.

column1: What is a Single Management Object (SMO)?
column2: An SMO is a single Security Gateway object in SmartConsole that represents a Security Group configured on Quantum Maestro Orchestrator.Â

column1: How does synchronization work? Is there an overhead with potentially 52 appliances in a MHO installation?
column2: MHO uses a special synchronization solution called HyperSync which provides high scale synchronization support without sacrificing Security Gateway performance.
